titleStmt.title: The system of grace, and free-will as 'tis held in the Catholick Church, and the Church of England; proposed, and vindicated. In a visitation sermon. By Stephen Nye.
titleStmt.author: Nye, Stephen, 1648?-1719.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Robinson at the Golden Lion in St. Paul's Church-yard, and A. Bell at the Cross Keys and Bible in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 3 reads: The system of grace, and free-will; as it is held in the Catholick Church, and the Church of England.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.

place.placeName: the Golden Lion in St. Paul's Church-yard
